summary: A new high school teacher tries to help troubled students and falls in love with the principal's secretary.
cast: Dick Clark|Victoria Shaw|Michael Callan|Tuesday Weld|Warren Berlinger|Roberta Shore|Doug McClure|Duane Eddy|James Darren|Linda Watkins|Chris Robinson|Rudy Bond|Wendell Holmes|Philip Coolidge|Bart Patton|Stephen Talbot|Jack Bryan|Kathryn Card|Al Casey|Malcolm Cassell|Franklyn Farnum|Bess Flowers|Paul Genge|Frances Karath|Marlyn Mason|Tom McBride|Shirley Mitchell|Susan Odin|Robin Riley|Bobby Rydell|John Zaremba
title: Because They're Young
